content: this is a legal summary of a court case that took place in ancona on february 8 2012 the case involved the dissolution of a jointly owned property between the plaintiffs and the heirs of mp the court determined that the plaintiffs own 912 of the property and the heirs own 312 since the property cannot be divided the court ordered the defendants share to be assigned to the plaintiffs who must pay the heirs the value of mps share the entire property will now be owned by the plaintiffs the court also ordered the plaintiffs to transfer their jointly owned share to the heirs and make a payment of €18250 within 90 days the registrar of property registries will handle the necessary formalities the parties are responsible for paying the costs of the courtappointed experts report the judgment was issued on june 26 2012
